      • readBinaryTree

        public static BinaryTree<java.lang.String> readBinaryTree​(java.util.Scanner scan)
        read binary tree for creating an expression tree
        Parameters:
        scan - scanner that is very useful here since it is a recursive call and it kinda works like an index here since the .next() method will move the scanner
        Returns:
        returns the binary tree formed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when the scanner passed is null
